meta.title: Motherhood changes everything. That's why we're making it easier to get your strength back.

hero.title: Start This Challenge Because You Get An Awesome Medal and Get To Virtually Explore Salem Witch Trials
hero.description: Get back to feeling strong, confident, and like yourself again with our safe, effective online workouts designed specifically for mums.

reasons.title: Reason #1: 87.93% of People Finish This Challenge Because Progress Is Real and Tangible
reasons.subtitle: Because we were tired of the polished, unachievable, and "quite fake" fitness industry that consistently fails mothers.

features.title: Amazing Medal
features.description: You get an amazing medal shipped to you upon completion.

features.title: Mobile App Tracking
features.description: You get to track your progress on The Conqueror's mobile app.

features.title: Flexible Deadlines
features.description: You get to choose your own deadline, making it achievable for everyone.

features.title: Virtual Map Progress
features.description: You can see yourself on the virtual map, making your progress much more tangible.

form.ctaTitle: Reason #2: Start Today Because Waiting Only Makes It Harder to Begin

testimonials.quote: This has been the most motivating thing I've ever seen for getting myself up off the couch and being active!
testimonials.author: Melissa Clark

testimonials.quote: I have never been very good at exercising – I like the idea more than the practice! But it wouldn't be overstating the case to say that the Conqueror Challenges have completely changed my whole outlook on things.
testimonials.author: Tony Peterson

testimonials.quote: I started my journey in Sept 2021 with the Ring of Kerry Ring Challenge. Every day I do my best to get myself out of my chair and it's so worth it. Every day I have found a new route to walk.
testimonials.author: Magdalena Nel

features.title: Reason #3: It Doesn't Feel Like Exercise Because You're Exploring Salem Witch Trials as You Move
features.description:
Victims. Lies. Verdict.
Discover the truth behind the most infamous trial in American History!

Take on the expedition through colonial villages, shadowed woods, and historic grounds. Unlock the full story piece by piece, and complete your journey with a medal that quietly honors the victims.

Start now and earn your glow-in-the-dark tarot medal that hides your fortune.
features.imageAlt: Salem Witch Trials virtual challenge app
featureList: Explore colonial villages and historic grounds
Unlock the full story piece by piece

cta.badge: FOR A LIMITED TIME, GET 20% OFF!
cta.title: Don't Give Up On your Fitness Goals Because Now You'll Actually Reach Them
